note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). All deaths in a country may not have been registered with a [cause of death](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death).
title: Cardiovascular death rate: crude versus age-standardized
subtitle: The reported annual death rate from [cardiovascular diseases](#dod:cvd) per 100,000 people, based on the [underlying cause](#dod:underlying-cause-of-death) listed on death certificates. This is compared between [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized) death rates and [crude](#dod:crude-death-rate) death rates.
